channel.title: Best beginner books for learning Java?
channel.description: Title. Actual books please no e-books.

item.title: Best beginner books for learning Java?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

http://www.amazon.co.uk/Java-How-Program-International-Version/dp/0273759760

I got this baby for free

Read full topic
item.source: Best beginner books for learning Java?

item.title: Best beginner books for learning Java?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:6, topic:542006”][quote author=Pure_ link=topic=660879.msg4418165#msg4418165 date=1396997071]
protip: Most e-books are physical books ported to the format…

OP I would suggest you read java docs (there must be a download somewhere) and feel free to ask us for help if you need it!
[/quote]

My eyes are burned out from 15 years of staring at a screen. It never used to bother me until I started using the computer for a living. I like to give my eyes a break and read real text every now and then :/[/quote]I’m at ~8 and climbing!! As I stated most e-books are ‘ports’ of hard-copies, just look for them on amazon.

Read full topic
item.source: Best beginner books for learning Java?

item.title: Best beginner books for learning Java?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“Pure_, post:5, topic:542006”]protip: Most e-books are physical books ported to the format…

OP I would suggest you read java docs (there must be a download somewhere) and feel free to ask us for help if you need it![/quote]

My eyes are burned out from 15 years of staring at a screen. It never used to bother me until I started using the computer for a living. I like to give my eyes a break and read real text every now and then

item.title: Best beginner books for learning Java?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Sessy Pk3r, post:2, topic:542006”]http://www.amazon.com/Java-Dummies-Computer-Tech/dp/1118407806/[/quote]I have read the e-book for this I hope you are kidding.

@Newty, I can’t really suggest one as I didn’t learn professionally but via docs online myself/and trial and error. Good luck.
